crm.output.entity.row.(	    StatusName = "Tracking"	or	StatusName = "Archive"	or 	StatusName = "Packaging and sending")

name: to Parcels preparation

rules.to: (	   $~>|$|{	       "payload":(	           crm.output.entity.row.(	               MpName!=null 	   and 	   MpOrderNumber!=null 	   and 	   MpShipMethod!=null 	   and 	   DateCrPayed!=null 	   and 	   DateShipBy!=null 	   and 	   DateDeliverBy!=null 	   and 	   ProblemDescription="-"	   and	   (StatusName="Order creation" or StatusName="Pending")	)	       )	?{	           "messages": [],	           "data": [	               {	                   "action": {	                       "type": "update",	                       "context": {	                           "Status": "14"	                       },	                       "delay": 0       	           	                   },	                   "entity":{	                       "type":crm.output.entity.type,	                       "name":crm.output.entity.name,	                       "rowId":crm.output.entity.row.Id          	               	                   }   	       	               }   	   	           ],	           "code": "200" 		       }:null	}|	).payload

name: to Archive

rules.to: (	   $~>|$|{	       "payload":(	           crm.output.entity.row.(	               (	                   StatusName="Deciding how to receive"	               and	               DealStatus="closed"	               )	               or	               (	                   StatusName="Waiting for receiving"	               and	               DealStatus="closed"	               )	               or	               (	                   StatusName="Return closing"	               and	               DealStatus="closed"	               )	               or	               (	                   StatusName="Deciding how to receive"	               and 	               ReturnLocation="none"	               and	               LabelCreator="none"	               )	           )	       	       )	?{	           "messages": [],	           "data": [	               {	                   "action": {	                       "type": "update",	                       "context": {	                           "Status": "62"	                       	                       },	                       "delay": 0       	           	                   	                   },	                   "entity":{	                       "type":crm.output.entity.type,	                       "name":crm.output.entity.name,	                       "rowId":crm.output.entity.row.Id          	               	                   	                   }   	       	               	               }   	   	           	           ],	           "code": "200" 		       	       }:null		   }|		).payload

name: deal creation

rules.to: (	   $~>|$|{	       "payload":(	           crm.output.entity.row.(	               StatusName="Waiting for receiving"	               and	               LabelCreator!=null	               and	               ReturnLocation!=null	               and 	               ProblemDescription="-"	           )	       	       )	?{	           "messages": [],	           "data": [	               {	                   "action": {	                       "type":"scenario_request",	                       "context":{	                           "scenario_id": "26"                                       	                       },	                       "delay": 60       	           	                   	                   },	                   "entity":{	                       "type":crm.output.entity.type,	                       "name":crm.output.entity.name,	                       "rowId":crm.output.entity.row.Id          	               	                   	                   }   	       	               	               }   	   	           	           ],	           "code": "200" 		       	       }:null		   }|		).payload

name: rule

rules.v: crm.output.entity.row.(	   (	       StatusName="Deciding how to receive"	        and	        ProblemDescription="-"	    )	    or	    (	       StatusName="Waiting for receiving"	        and	        ProblemDescription="-"	    )	)

info: ProblemDescription "-"

name: item not shipped ebay

rules.to: (	   $~>|$|{	       "payload":(	           crm.output.entity.row.(	               StatusName="Waiting for receiving"	               and	               MpName in ["Ebay Rollun","Ebay Plaisir"]	           )	       )	?{	           "messages": [],	           "data": [	               {	                   "action": {	                       "type":"scenario_request",	                       "context":{	                           "scenario_id": "27"                                       	                       },	                       "delay": 20160*60       	           	                   	                   },	                   "entity":{	                       "type":crm.output.entity.type,	                       "name":crm.output.entity.name,	                       "rowId":crm.output.entity.row.Id          	               	                   	                   }   	       	               	               }   	   	           	           ],	           "code": "200" 		       	       }:null		   }|		).payload

name: item not shipped amazon

name: status updated?

rules.to: log.(	    $exists(level)?	    $~>|$|{	            "level":level	    }|	    :	        $~>|$|{	            "level":"critical",	            "message":"there is not log.level. Message: " & message	        }|	)		/*	[	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"debug",	                "message":"there is Message"	            }	    },	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "message":"there is Message",	                "context":{}	            }	    }	]	*/

$.(		    (log.level in ["error","alert","critical"])?(	            $merge([	                $exists(log.context)?log.context:{},	                $exists(rlln)?	                {	                    "rlln":rlln	                }:{},	                $exists(payload)?	                {	                    "payload":payload	                }:{},	                {	                    "globs":{	                        "dlvdCache":$globalContext("dlvdCache"),	                        "saveCache":$globalContext("saveCache"),	                        "RLST":$globalContext("RLST")	                    	                    }	                }	            ])    	        	    ):(	        $exists(log.context)?log.context:{}	    )	)		/*								    (	        log.level in ["error","alert","critical"]	            and 	        $exists(log.context)	    )?	        rlln	    :	        ($exists(log.context)?(log.context):null)	)			[	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"error",	                "message":"there is Message"	            },	        "rlln":{"evnt":{}}   	    },	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"info",	                "message":"there is Message",	                "context":{"arr":[1,2]}	            },	        "rlln":{"evnt":{}}   	    },	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"info",	                "message":"there is Message",	                "context":{"arr":[1,2]}	            }	    },	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"info",	                "message":"there is Message"	            }	    }	    	]		*/

info:
додати в приклад даних інфо про те, що потрібен
окремий об'єкт в "crm", що міститиме 
масив з екшенами або меседжами

rules.to: (	   $~>|$|{	       "payload":(	           crm.output.entity.row.(	               ProblemDescription="-" 	                and 	                StatusName="Parcels preparation" 	                and	                TracknumbersInMp=null	                and 	                (MpShipMethod="Standard"	                or	                MpShipMethod="FreeEconomy")	                and 	                HowToBuy4BestShipping!=null	           )	       ) ?{	           "messages": [],	           "data":[	               {	                   "action":{	                       "type":"scenario_request",	                       "context":{	                           "scenario_id": "4"                                       	                       },	                       "delay":0                            	                   },	                   "entity":{	                       "type":crm.output.entity.type,	                       "name":crm.output.entity.name,	                       "rowId":crm.output.entity.row.Id                            	                   }                    	               }            	           ],	           "code":"200"     	       }:{    "messages": [],    "data":[]    } 	   }|	).payload
